title: Lenovo Tab 4 8 2 GB RAM 16 GB ROM 8 inch with Wi-Fi+4G Tablet (Slate Black)

product_specification.Processor Type: Qualcomm Snapdragon MSM8917 Quad Core 64-bit Processor
product_specification.Operating Frequency: GSM: B2/B3/B5/B8, UMTS: B1/B2/B5/B8, 4G FDD LTE: B1/B3/B5/B7/B8/B20, 4G TDD LTE: B38/B40
product_specification.Additional Features: Dolby Atmos Sound, 2 x Front Facing Speakers, Lenovo Applications: Lenovo SHAREit, Lenovo SYNCit, Lenovo Framework, Lenovo Account, Lenovo User Experience (UE), Third Party Applications: Google Calendar, Netflix, Microsoft Word, Microsoft Excel, Microsoft Powerpoint, Microsoft Outlook, OneNote Microsoft, OneDrive Microsoft, Skype
product_specification.Sales Package: Tablet, Charger, USB Cable, Quick Start Guide, Warranty Card
product_specification.Internet Browsing Time: WiFi: Over 10 Hours, 3G: Over 10 Hours, LTE: Over 10 Hours
product_specification.Other Camera Features: Auto Focus Rear Camera, Fixed Focus Front Camera
product_specification.Other Display Features: 60% Color Gamut, 350 nits Brightness, 8-bit Color Depth, 10 Point Multi-touch Display
product_specification.Warranty Summary: 1 Year on Tablet, 6 Months on Accessories

product_description.HD Display for Captivating Visuals: From Netflix to video games, enjoy a wide-angle viewing experience on the 20.32 cm (8) HD display.
product_description.High-quality Audio: Enjoy your favourite tracks to the fullest, with or without headphones, thanks to the Dolby Atmos technology.
product_description.Sleek and Lightweight: With 8.2 mm thickness and weighing only 310 grams, it is easy to carry around by anyone.
product_description.Performance That Commands Respect: A Qualcomm Snapdragon 64-bit quad-core processor, 2 GB of RAM and 16 GB of internal memory make for a seamless and fast user experience.
product_description.One Tablet, Multiple Accounts: Each member of the family can have their own account with individual passwords, settings and social media accounts, all on one tablet.

review:
Its a decent tab at a big billion day price of 11700/-. After all my research, I could see this tab only which was latest (apart from Apple product)

Only thing the company can improve is internal memory! However this do support external memory.

Nothing new but a budget tab to read , play and watch movies! The sound quality is good.

A decent budget tablet. Neat HD display. No lag. Did not use the SD card yet, so need to see the performance after inserting the SD card. I recommend using class 10 card. Brilliant sound from the inbuilt speakers. Haven't tried games with high graphics but it was able to handle other games flawlessly. Wifi reception is very decent. Comes with pre installed MS office. Very less to no bloatware. Please do not compare this with other tablets at the range of Rs 25000. If you are looking for a great camera, this is not the one for you.

Got this tab for 9999. overall it is great. battery and display are awesome. camera is just ok. lags a little in moving between screens but that is not too bad. at this price this is a good option. very sleek and light weight. storage is just 16 gb of which 7 gb is already utilized by system and preinstalled apps. i bought 32gb memory card and the tab formatted the memory card as internal storage which is very nice feature. there is LTE but no VoLTE, so Jio sim will work but you need to install Jiovoice app to make voice calls.

I personally am in love with this product!
Quality for the money you spend!
Lenovo and flipkart together have delivered me a good product

Its nice and works very smooth.. the only issue is it take too long to get full charged from 9-100%. And plz don't look for a great camera, here u can get a bit
Disappointed. Rest is fine with this tab under this budget..go for it guys.

Generally i dont write reviews after purchasing any product but I loved this Tab. It contains Dolby atmos due to this Sound Quality is Superb. I was shocked while listening the song. It sounds like home theatre. Cons of this Tab is camera because camera quality is not good and This tab takes a lot of time to full charge. Rest is all good and value for Money.

I purchased 4 items in flipkart, delivery service is very best. Delivery man good response.
In the Lenovo tab 4 8,net connection symbol is not seen on top on the screen display (example:two arrow mark..net connection symbol..seen in the top of the screen in Lenovo and Moto phones) .it use for switch off net connection at the time of not net use time.the remark see the Lenovo tab 4 8 tablet.another facilities is inclusive,.resolution....is best and economically very best...).

I was searching for a tab for long time at less price as i need for my parents mainly for watsapp, skype calls, play youtube videos; then i found lenovo tab 8 but bit hesitant to buy intially suspecting 2gb ram may lag performance as well front camera of 2megapixels may be poor for video calls. Then i realized only for higher pixels display like Full HD 2gb ram may not suffice n since this tab only supports till 1268*768 pixels(HD not full hd) 2GB ram should suffice for normal usage like my parents usecase and so only front camera pixel density could be less but should be ok for video calls with a pinch. i was waiting for price down by flipkart to less than 10k and recently the tab price was reduced to 9999 as part of womens day offer..so without double thinking i bought it..also except honor tab, the other tab of same specs are costlier..in reality after purchase there is no performance lag while playing youtube videos or any video calls or for any normal usage of phone for calls, watsapp and so please go for it if you need a tab at less price for regular usage like watsapp, skype calls, youtube video play..if it is for gaming or high processing or need high pixel camera or display then this is not the one
thank you flipkart for the amazing discount and a great product owned, happy flipkart shopping.
Tab 4 8 is good in general. The power charging cord is not of good quality. They could have included screen guard, cover as they are not available in correct size right now...

Recently Bought, but i am not satisfied with the product. After receiving 3 updates out of the box including the oreo update, more of the time apps are crashing, hangs, freezes. The problem is due to less ram, but earliest i have the redmi 3s phone with same configuration and it works very good. The other Big Problem with this tab is the battery, the life is good but it takes more than 6 hours to full charge. I also try to charge with mi fast charging power bank and the time is almost same.

The sound quality from the dual front speakers is very good. The Build quantity is also fine.

I bought it for watching movies on youtube and other apps. Its fine for that purpose. I have installed minimum apps and uninstall and disable the useless apps.

It has the lag when changing the apps and more battery charging time.
Overall better compared to the competitors in terms of money
